channel.title: run on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in run on Barefoot Rob

item.title: running barefoot to the train
item.description: 17:18 Friday 04 December 2015 JST I made it from Chez Soness to Chigasaki in about 13 minutes, running barefoot most of the way! It was a bit spooky in the dark, but I didn’t step on many ouchy rocks.
